thread.title: Kingsley Osei Bonsu elevated to the position of chairman at Bechem United, new CEO appointed
thread.title_full: Kingsley Osei Bonsu elevated to the position of chairman at Bechem United, new CEO appointed

title: Kingsley Osei Bonsu elevated to the position of chairman at Bechem United, new CEO appointed
text:
16:40 CET Kingsley Osei Bonsu elevated to the position of chairman at Bechem United, new CEO appointed Kingsley Osei Bonsu 
Kingsley Osei Bonsu claim he has been elevated to the position of chairman at Bechem United. 
Club President Kingsley Owusu Achau has appointed a new Chief Executive Officer to run the day-to-day affairs of the club. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com Sports News Follow Us It is my mental attitude not external events that has the power to make or break me By: Nana Adjoa Boahemaa
